content.question: An insect population in an agricultural field is affected by monthly applications of a pesticide, as shown in the graph above. A likely cause of the overall increase in the insect population over time is

choices.label: an increase in the population of insect predators
an increase in average temperature over the summer
a decrease in the moisture content of the soil
the survival of increasing numbers of resistant insects

content.answer: the survival of increasing numbers of resistant insects

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
